Logix Blossom Greens Noida

Logix Blossom Greens
Logix Group Presents new project by the name of logix blossom greens in sec-143 Noida, Project offers luxury 2,3,4 BHK, penthouses and villas with private parking area exclusive tower dedication to senior citizen with a dedicated lush green meditation, park vaastu compliant, master plan & layout, word class club houses and private lawn for ground floors. Project having unique master plan which is designed by the leading architectural firms based in UK – HKR and DFA. The project is spread over 25 acres of green area.

Project will be dotted with green spans and scientifically designed spaces and this is what will make the place a heartland full of freedom.

Project will have excellent amenities such as club house, swimming pool, gymnasium, business center, play school, creche etc.

A WORLD CLASS DESTINATION
In the heart of NOIDA lies a destination that is desined to become the most cherished residential address.Blossom Greens is dotted with green spans and scientifically designed spaces.And this is what makes the place a heartland full of freedom.

Dlf Planned - Dlf mullanpur plots in new chandigarh

Dlf Planned - Dlf mullanpur plots in new chandigarh Call @9899588589.

Being developed by DLF Home Developers Limited over an area of 1,250 acre of land with an investment of Rs 2,700 crore at Mullanpur Chandigarh Local Planning Area under Greater Mohali Area Development Authority (GMADA).

New Chandigarh is the next biggest development from DLF after Gurgaon. Located 5-6 Kms from PGI hospital, this township will be a haven of lush green meadows, sub urban lifestyle and all modern facilities to make it a perfect lifestyle. The township planning will be of international standard with wide roads, environment friendly features and secure living.

More Deatils about dlf mullanpur plots in chandigarh @9899588589

Supertech North Eye the tallest residential development

The NCR is abuzz with the news of the tallest residential development of North India, coming up in Noida. This township is seeing a flurry of real estate activity, specially residential projects. Home to more than 7 lac people, Noida today boasts a contemporary lifestyle away from the hustle-bustle of Delhi.

The upcoming skyscraper, called Supertech North Eye, will be 255 metres high and will have 60 floors. This is way higher than the height of the Qutab Minar or even the Statue of Liberty. The tower will be a part of cape Town – a 50 acre self-sustained township in sector 74, Noida.

The tower is the brainchild of the real estate firm Supertech. Supertech has a number of existing, ongoing and planned projects in the NCR.

For Supertech North Eye, the company claims to have hired the best technical brains from across the world. The rich-in-specification residential units will feature top-of-line comforts and facilities. On offer will be studio apartments, 2, 3 and 4 BHK condominiums.

North Eye will have an infinity pool and an open air restaurant on the 60th level. It will also feature an abservatory and a high-end business centre. A modern retail shopping centre, a nightclub, a helipad and a dedicated kids’ zone will also be part of the tower.

Sunworld is going to launch Sunworld Vanalika in Noida secto

Sunworld is going to launch its most awaiting project Sunworld Vanalika in sector 107 Noida. It is in 7.5 acres of land area with apartments & duplex. It is situated at very hot and beautiful location of Noida Sec-107 with 80% of green area. Plots are three side open & corner. Flat, Apartment and Duplex are available, from size- 1405 to 3400 Sq.ft . Inaugural Discount Rs. 200 Per Sq. Ft.

Sunworld infrastructure is an incorporated business conglomerate that aspires to attain strong intensification and expansion of real state and investment ventures.

Emaar MGF Launches Palm Gardens In Gurgaon Sector 83

Emaar MGF launches the most awaiting project “Emaar MGF Palm Gardens”, adjacent to NH-8 in Sector 83 Gurgaon. It is a 22 Acres premium development with 8 acres of Sprawling Central Greens. It offers 3 and 5 bedroom apartments, duplexes and penthouses with ultra modern facilities such as tennis courts, badminton courts, basketball courts, convenient shopping and car parking lots. Sample apartment will be ready in early December with high efficiency floor plans. The Project has the following features:

Modern Gated 22 Acres development which will have 8 Acres of dedicated Central Landscaped Greens and Park.
Premium 3 Bedroom, Lounge & S. Room with Efficient Floor Plans.
Located next to NH-8, Proposed Metro Station and Dwarka-Expressway.
Consolidated Central Green (approx. 8 acres).
All Apartments Facing Greens / Sports Facilities.
Evenly spread Recreational Zones, Tennis, Badminton and Basketball Courts.
Modern Amenities and Convenient Shopping.
Duplex Units at Ground Floor, Penthouse Level.
Basement for Covered Parking.

Amrapali Guoup Launches Amrapali Hearbeat City.

Amrapali Heartbeat City is a new residential property for sale in Noida. It is being launched at Sector 107 by the prestigious Developer Amrapali Group. It is one of the chief providers of residential real estate property in Noida. This premium residential property for sale at sector 107 offers pristine residences in the form of 2, 3 & 4 BHK apartments. Project is equipped with the most modern amenities that any other residential property in Noida has ever experienced.
In this project Amrapali Group is introducing the concept of sky bungalows which ensures spacious spread-out living for the first time.
It has all the advantages of bungalows without hassles of bungalows on ground. It has spacious and independent private entrance, plenty of sunlight, cross-ventilation from all sides and complete privacy and security.
At, Amrapali Heart Beat City an indulging club would be at your service, that will keep your social spirits up and high. Mottled with various indoor games, amusement choices, in-house snack-eatery and many other features, this coddling club will call your evening into its embrace to let you unwind and relax.

Amrapali Heartbeat City Noida

Amrapali Heartbeat City Noida is a new residential property for sale in Noida that is being launched at Sector 107 by the prestigious Developer Amrapali Group; one of the chief providers of residential real estate property in Noida. This premium residential property for sale at sector 107 offers pristine residences in the form of 2, 3 & 4 BHK apartments. Heartbeat City Noida is equipped with the most modern amenities that any other residential property in Noida has ever experienced. The project has the following salient features:

· 4 Tier Security System.
· Meditation Court.
· Lift with personalized electronic key for every owner.
· A complex that offers both indoor & outdoor sporting facilities of highest standards.
· Sky Bungalows with no shared wall with others.
· Wi-Fi connectivity in club areas.

For more details, please visit http://amrapaliheartbeat.com or call us at +91-9818885931, +91-9818882195
Email : info@prithvee.in

Supertech Upcountry Plots :: Supertech Plots :: Yamuna Expre

Supertech Group, founded in 1988, has set new trends and benchmarks of architectural excellence in the contemporary global scenario. An ISO 9001:2000 certified company; Supertech has successfully completed 20 years in real estate business and today it has revolutionized the real estate arena.

Now Supertech Group is opening shortly the bookings for Plots in Noida. Locations of these plots are on Yamuna Expressway, Greater Noida. Sizes of the plots are 100 sq. yds., 150 sq. yds. and 200 sq. yds.. Supertech upcountry plots are available at very affordable prices. Tentative costs of these plots will start from Rs. 15 Lacs onward. Each plot is unique and captures the spirit. These expandable flats give you the flexibility and space to choose how and when to shape it to match your lifestyle.

So the salient features of these plots are:
Supertech Upcountry Residential Plots are located at Yamuna Expressway-Greater Noida.
Supertech Upcountry Plots Type : Residential Plots.
Supertech Upcountry Plots Sizes : 100, 150 & 200 Sq.Yds.
Supertech Upcountry Plots Price & Rate starts @ 15 lacs onwards.

Supertech plots are part of a township upcountry 2, a township by Supertech Group. Supertech Upcountry 2 township comprises of apartments, Plots, Villas, Castles and High Rise apartments and integrated township with an area of approx 100 acres and has various range of artistically and vastu friendly designed architectures. Supertech Upcountry is presenting the Spanish Villas and Roman Castles for a blend of community life with luxurious European-style private living. Pick a Spanish or a Roman way of life for yourself and your family. You will have a complete European experience, with an Indian price tag being the only gentle reminder where you actually are.

To grab this golden opportunity, you may:

Call at: +91-9810206377 or
Visit: http://www.supertechplots.in
E-mail: info@prithvee.com

Era Sky Ville - Lifestyle with World Class Homes Amenities!

Era SKY VILLE :: Sector 68 :: Gurgaon :: Overview

Era Landmarks Ltd. Launches Sky Ville ultra luxury 2/3 BHK apartments in sector 68 Gurgaon. A lifestyle equipped, group housing project spread over a sprawling 22-acre area , ensconce in the NCR region.

ERA SKY VILLE GURGAON, Sector 68 is located:-
Approximately 25 kms from Indira Gandhi International Airport.
Approximately 6.5 kms from Rajeev Chowk, Gurgaon.
With easy access to Mehruli–Gurgaon Road, the commercial centre of Gurgaon.
Adjacent to the commercial development on the Sohna Road.
Amidst high end commercial & residential development by all leading developers.
Near 2 renowned educational institutions "Pathways" & "Goenka".
15 kms away from Damdama Lake - the famous tourist resort.

ABOUT ERA
Era Landmarks Ltd, over two decades, is a world class engineering, construction and services conglomerate, dedicated to the unwavering pursuit of excellence and innovation across the entire spectrum of infrastructure development including power transmission & distribution.

In Incredible India! Indian economy is growing rapidly, it has been causing for the higher demand of residential properties, and due to this growth we are seeing the price rate of residential properties is also getting higher and higher day to day in Gurgaon. The construction of apartments on a wide scale is also a part of this renovation. The Era Sky Ville Apartments in Gurgaon ranges from luxurious to simple, from fully furnished to non-furnished, and from 2bhk to 4bhk. The introduction of Sky Ville apartments into the real estate market has gifted a better lifestyle to many. Now these apartments are also providing you a luxurious standard of living, and a large no. of Sky Ville apartments is available for sale in Gurgaon.

Mostly people now prefer to choose their dream house as an apartment. This is so because an apartment provides you a life full of all the comforts along with being affordable in price.

Era Sky Ville Gurgaon :: SkyVille Sohna Road Gurgaon

Era Landmarks Ltd. presents Era SKY VILLE, a lifestyle equipped group housing project spread over a sprawling 22-acre area in Gurgaon, Sector 68, ensconced in the NCR region. Era SKY VILLE Gurgaon is located approximately 25 kms from Indira Gandhi International Airport, and approximately 6.5 kms from Rajeev Chowk, Gurgaon. Moreover, the township is adjacent to the commercial development on the Sohna Road. It is near to 2 renowned educational institutions "Pathways" & "Goenka."

Era SKY VILLE Gurgaon apartments are being built up by some of the reputed names of the real estate industry. Along with providing you the basic amenities of living such as 24x7 securities, 24 hrs of water supply and power back up, these township apartments will also provide you some extra facilities such as schools, clubs, parks, malls, etc. Constructions of the apartments are going on in South city, Sohna Road and Shushant Lok. These apartments are available for sale at a very affordable price range starting from Rs. 47.25 lacs only.

For more details Call Now at +91-8527-444-666 or +91-9310-042-683 or Visit http://eraskyville.co.in
Email: info@akgurgaon.com

era sky ville Gurgaon

Era Landmark Ltd is launching soon a 2BHK & 3BHK residential project, Era Sky Ville in Gurgaon. Era Sky Ville, a lifestyle equipped group housing project with an affordable price, is sprawled across a 22-acre area in Sector 68, ensconced in the NCR region.

Gurgaon Projects

Gurgaon Projects
We introduce ourselves as Lares and Penates, a professionally managed real estate organization engaged in the business of buying and selling of residential and commercial properties in Gurgaon.
This web site of ours provides updated details of all premium residential projects of DLF in Gurgaon and their current pricing in resale market.
We are also working closely with other developers like Unitech, Ansals, Vipul, Eros., Essel group, Emaar MGF and Vatika.
At Lares and Penates, we believe that property is the most treasured part of an individual's/organisation's overall wealth index. This makes it imperative for us that we generate an obvious confidence and reliance in the minds of the prospective property buyers that they are dealing with a consummate professional demonstrating the highest level of service and integrity.
At Lares and Penates, we continuously strive towards strengthening our means which inspires us: -
To keep a constant watch on the real estate market and increase our information level on the changing needs, desires and aspirations of the customers.
To maintain an adequate property stock to offer choice to the customers.
To respond in a proactive manner to the consumer requests for services, products and information.
To strengthen our network of affiliates in the field of finance and mortgages, home improvement services, on-line real estate business solutions, laisioning agencies dealing with HUDA, DDA, MCD and L&DO, legal title search and technical agencies.
A brief detail of our principal activities has been outlined below:-
Sale and Purchase
Rental Services – Residential and Commercial
Property Investment and Management services
Property Finance and Mortgage
Rental Securitization /discounting services
Property legal and technical evaluation
Project finance
Property Laisioning and Consultancy services
For consultation and advisory services, please contact Mr. Rakesh Arora on 9810270569 & 9560605050.
